Lists the necessary local environment and IDE settings for building and deploying _tll_ projects.

= environment =

== jdk ==
  * Download and install the [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp jdk] version jdk1.6.0_05 or higher.

== groovy ==
  * Download and install [http://gant.codehaus.org/ groovy] version 1.5.4+.
  * Set environment variable: *GROOVY_HOME* that points to the root groovy install dir.
  * Ensure the Path environment variable includes the path: <GROOVY_HOME>/bin.

== ant ==
  * Download and install [http://ant.apache.org/ ant] version 1.7.0+.
  * Set environment variable: *ANT_HOME* that points to the root ant install dir.
  * Ensure the Path environment variable includes the path: <ANT_HOME>/bin.

== gant ==
  * Download and install [http://gant.codehaus.org/ gant] version 1.1.1+.
  * With groovy already installed, run the gant install script from the gant install dir: groovy bin/install.groovy

= eclipse =
The following steps cover the necessary [http://www.eclipse.org/ eclipse] IDE workspace settings for the _tll_ projects.


== Classpath Variables ==
The following _Preferences -> Java -> Build Path -> *Classpath Variables*_ are required:
  * TLL_ROOT - Points to the root dir of the _tll_ source tree.

== User Libraries ==
The following _Preferences -> Java -> Build Path -> *User Libraries*_ are required for building the tll-util, tll-config and tll-mail projects and represent the necessary dependencies:
